network.client

Class RemoteWeaponHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.notify.WeaponNotify
      • network.client.RemoteWeaponHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<Event>

    public class RemoteWeaponHandler
extends WeaponNotify
implements Observer<Event>
    Handler for the "Weapon" Message and Event objects. It works both as a Controller and as a Model for the View.
    Author:
    Michele Leva

    • Method Detail

      • stringToMessage

        public void stringToMessage(java.lang.String[] inputs)
        It simulates the Model notify method. Once received the message object form the NetworkHandler the method uses the correct update in the view through Overloading.
        Parameters:
        inputs - array of strings received from the NetworkHandler.

      • update

        public void update(Event message)
        Received an Event object from the View it serializes it adding its class tag then sends the string through the socket.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer<Event>
        Parameters:
        message - to be sent.
